update.foreach: UPDATE pms_project_task SET task_name = #{item.taskName}, task_type = #{item.taskType}, start_date = STR_TO_DATE(#{item.startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), end_date = STR_TO_DATE(#{item.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), duration = #{item.duration}, predecessor_id = #{item.predecessorId}, assign_user_id = #{item.assignUserId}, sort_num = #{item.sortNum}, p_id = #{item.pId}, description = #{item.description}, progress = #{item.progress}, completion_date = STR_TO_DATE(#{item.completionDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') WHERE id = #{item.id}

mapper.select:
select count(DISTINCT t1.id) from pms_project_task t1 left join pms_project t2 on t1.project_id = t2.id where t1.assign_user_id = #{userId} and t1.id not in (select p_id from pms_project_task where p_id is not null) and t2.is_deleted != '1' and t2.project_status = '1'
and t1.progress = 100
and t2.is_archived !='1' and t1.progress < 100
and t2.is_archived !='1' and t1.progress < 100 and t1.end_date < now()
